title: FS: T206 Ed Reagan - Southern Leaguer - SOLD
author: Anthony S.

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ed Reagan - Southern Leaguer - SOLD
posts.post_content:
T206 Ed Reagan   $115 delivered - SOLD

Front presents like a 5.  Strong centering.  No creases or wrinkles.  Slightly dinged upper left corner.  Back has paper loss above the Old Mill insignia that extends from the "L" in Old to the "M" in Mill.


My email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]

I'll take him!  E-mail sent.

Marty
